author: mariohavel
content:
<@&857649635274915900> Office Hours update: 

First of all, the recording from yesterday is out! Check it out if you are interested in manually handling Ethereum client software. I underestimated our time constrains and I wished to finish and demonstrate even more things. But if you'd like some follow up or you need help with setting up some specific part of the stack, please just let me know here and I can do some stream again, outside of office hours and with more time ðŸ™‚ 
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1rMVv-2z2sK1l8Ll_U56stTifgUYljZln/view?usp=sharing

author: mariohavel
content: And next up some exciting news - for the following Office Hours call, we will be joined by @Piper for the first AMA of this cohort! ðŸ”¥  Piper has been contributing to Ethereum since its early days and worked on many interesting projects. Take the opportunity to learn about his experience with Ethereum development and prepare some insightful questions, especially if you are interested in Portal Network, glados or Ethereum python ecosystem.
